attributes.action: Allow us the right to have street partys for ENGLISH events
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some of us asked for a street party for the Queens royal golden jubilee but were not allowed it......

It wasnt for a main road it was for a very small side road which would not cause any traffic in the least.
It annoys me when i hear that places such as southall ( which is often called little india) is allowed to close a very major road for festivals such as diwali and eid..

I personally think that this is not fair.

I think that within reason we should be allowed to have street partys to celebrate St. George's day or Royal events.
